articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Tactical Rocket Test-fire
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Tactical Rocket Test-fire
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- On the occasion of the 69th anniversary of the liberation of Korea, the DPRK test-fired an ultra-precision high-performance tactical rocket of Korean style which was developed on the initiative of supreme leader Kim Jong Un and under his guidance.
					 Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, guided the test-fire.
					
					 He learned about the engineering data of the tactical rocket on the observation post and issued an order to test-fire it.
					
					 The test-fire proved and confirmed that the maneuverability of the tactical rocket in different trajectories fully meets the requirements of latest military science and technology.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the test-fire was successfully carried out as intended by the Central Committee of the WPK. He highly appreciated the feats of officials, scientists and technicians in the field of national defense science and munitions factories.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that they would propose more advanced national defense science and technology tasks on the basis of the successes already achieved and positively contribute to qualitatively bolstering up the revolutionary armed forces of the country. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Ri Yong Gil, Pyon In Son, Pak Jong Chon and Hong Yong Chil.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kalma Foodstuff Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kalma Foodstuff Factory
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the newly commissioned Kalma Foodstuff Factory.
					 Going round various places of the factory including rooms for combined control, first processing, freezing vacuum, selection and packing, he acquainted himself in detail with production and business activities.
					
					 Recalling that he underlined the need to make good preparations for starting its operation such as establishing an integrated production system with the help of computers and realizing the modernization of production processes, he noted with great satisfaction that the factory successfully carried out the task given by the party.
					
					 He said that the factory put its business activities on an IT basis and computerized them on a high level, streamlined all production processes from fish processing to carrying and packing and was keeping the production site neat and clean.
					
					 Underlining the need for the Kalma Foodstuff Factory to keep its production going at a high rate, he gave precious instructions to do so.
					
					 He specified tasks and ways to scrupulously manage and operate the factory including the issues of properly establishing a raw materials supply system, fully ensuring quality of products and sanitation and safety, developing and producing unchallenged foodstuff that can represent the Kalma Foodstuff Factory in taste and quality and improving packing.
					
					 Going round scientific and technological knowledge dissemination room, meeting room and the lounge of the hostel of the factory, he was pleased that its employees can acquire a lot of advanced technology and have been provided with good living conditions.
					
					 He noted with great pleasure that the work to finish the project of the factory was done so successfully that it was hard to recognize its appearance when he was visiting it last time. He added: "Its interior looks like a palace while its exterior looks like a park. The longer one watches the factory, the cozier and more attractive it looks. It is a rest home-like and fashionable factory."
					
					 Expressing expectation and belief that the employees of the factory would successfully carry out their duty, he had a photo session with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by Han Kwang Sang, department director of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine and chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization, on Friday.
					 The message said:
					
					 Pleased to join you in celebrating the day of the country's liberation achieved at the noblest sacrifice of your people, I hope for progress and prosperity wanted by your country and people on behalf of the state and people of Palestine and on my own behalf on this occasion.
					
					 We attach importance to the DPRK-Palestine relations with the decades-long history.
					
					 The DPRK is a true friend who offered all possible assistance to our struggle to terminate Israel's occupation.
					
					 I am sure that your country will invariably adhere to the principled stand to put an end to the ceaseless military attack by Israel on our people, the war crimes which should be settled accounts with and denounced worldwide.

articles.title: Protocol Signed between Governments of DPRK and Russia
articles.content:
Protocol Signed between Governments of DPRK and Russia
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- A protocol on the 5th meeting of the joint working group for settling issues related to the implementation of the agreement on the temporary work of citizens of other states in the territory of a state between governments of the DPRK and Russia was signed here on Friday.
					 Present at the signing-ceremony were Ri Kwang Gun, vice-minister of External Economic Relations, officials concerned, members of the delegation of the Federal Emigration Bureau of Russia led by Deputy Director Anatoli Kuznetsov, Pavel Leshakov, councilor of the Russian embassy here.
					
					 Ri and Kuznetsov signed the protocol.

articles.title: Talks between FMs of DPRK and Singapore Held
articles.content:
Talks between FMs of DPRK and Singapore Held
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Talks between DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong who is heading the DPRK government delegation on a visit to Singapore and K Shanmugam, foreign minister who is minister of Justice were held at the building of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs on Thursday.
					 Present at the talks from the DPRK side were members of the delegation and the DPRK ambassador to Singapore and a staff member of his embassy and from the Singapore side the permanent secretary and the director-general of the Department of Northeast Asian Affairs of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and others.
					
					 At the talks both sides discussed the issues of boosting the bilateral relations between the two countries.
					
					 Meanwhile, the DPRK foreign minister met with the honorary senior minister and the minister of trade industry of Singapore.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Congo
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Congo
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Friday sent a message of greeting to Denis Sassou Nguesso, president of Congo, on the occasion of the 54th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed belief that the excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, sincerely wishing the president and people of Congo greater successes in the work for the development of the country and national prosperity.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Car Riding Group
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Car Riding Group
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, met with the Russia-cross Korean Peninsula car riding group headed by Kim Chil Song, first vice-chairman of the International United Confederation of Koreans who is chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia, and had a talk with it on Friday. The group is taking part in the "Paektu-Halla car riding for supporting the peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula".

articles.title: Car Riding Group Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Car Riding Group Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The Russia-cross Korean Peninsula car riding group visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Friday. The group is taking part in the "Paektu-Halla car riding for supporting the peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula". 
					 The members of the group went round historic relics preserved at the old home in Mangyongdae, being briefed on the undying story about the historic home.
					
					 The head of the group said Kim Il Sung is the great man who glorified the dignity and honor of the nation. He went on:
					
					 Our homeland will prosper forever as it is led by the peerless great men.
					
					 The group also visited the Munsu Water Park and watched a performance given by the art group members of the Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, working people and youth and students paid tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of the liberation of Korea.
					 Seen standing before the statues on Mansu Hill was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Placed before the statues were floral baskets in the name of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the KPISF, and institutions, enterprises, factories, farms and schools in Pyongyang and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the statues in humble reverence.
					
					 Floral baskets, bouquets and flowers were laid before the statues of the President and Kim Jong Il at Kim Il Sung University, Kim Il Sung Military University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of the People's Security, the Mansudae Art Studio and other parts of the city.
					
					 Service personnel, working people and youth and students across the country paid tribute to the statues and portraits of the smiling President and Kim Jong Il in their residential areas.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Leaves
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Federal Emigration Bureau of Russia led by Deputy Director Anatoli Kuznetsov left here for home on Friday.

articles.title: Revolutionary Exploits of Peerless Great Men of Mt. Paektu Lauded by Papers
articles.content:
Revolutionary Exploits of Peerless Great Men of Mt. Paektu Lauded by Papers
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK papers here Friday carry editorials praising President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for performing the revolutionary exploits on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 The Juche-oriented revolutionary lines, programmes for struggle and original strategies and tactics advanced by the President during the arduous anti-Japanese armed struggle served as the militant banners which brought the dawn of Korea's liberation and flared up the flame of the all-people resistance.
					
					 The President had one million-strong Japanese imperialists under his thumb with his outstanding idea, war methods, ever-changing stratagem and rare commanding art and defeated the Japanese imperialists who styled themselves the "leader of Asia". Herein lies the great significance of the President's anti-Japanese revolutionary exploits.
					
					 He led various stages of social revolutions and socialist construction to victory on the basis of the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu and rich experiences created by him during the anti-Japanese war.
					
					 The country associated with his whole life threw its rays as invincible power thanks to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Juche revolution which started from Mt. Paektu has made a long drive under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il. On this historic advance the DPRK is shining as the invincible power making a leaping forward to an economic power in the high-pitched drive to carry out the industrial revolution in the new century and make a breakthrough for cutting edge with the inexhaustible national power with the military muscle as a pillar.
					
					 The DPRK is now ushering in the greatest heyday of prosperity while making the eye-opening creation and changes as it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the great cause of Mt. Paektu, possessed of the mettle and spirit of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Minju Joson praises the revolutionary exploits the President and Kim Jong Il performed by making the history of new Korea and adding brilliance to it. Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea will prosper forever as Kim Jong Un, identical to them, is leading the Korean people, it stresses.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Slammed for Talking about "Orthodoxy"
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Slammed for Talking about "Orthodoxy"
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- There spreads in south Korea a strange rumor slandering the DPRK, fortress of national independence, while distorting the historic significance of the August 15 liberation of Korea and justifying the fabrication of the puppet regime. The puppet forces are distorting the reality as if the regime were carrying forward any "orthodoxy", clamoring about its "root" and "history".
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Friday terms it an unbearable mockery of the anti-Japanese martyrs who laid down their lives for the cause of the country's liberation and an unpardonable racket besmirching the proud history of the Korean nation which undauntedly fought against the aggression by foreign forces for the sake of the nation's sovereignty. It goes on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities are loudly talking about "law" and "orthodoxy". It is linked with their treacherous attempt at unification of social systems.
					
					 The puppet ruling forces are busy leading "unification" by peddling the "doctrine of gaining a great opportunity of unification" and "Dresden declaration" and, at the same time, misleading public opinion by setting up the "unification preparatory committee" and crying out for "getting ready for unification".
					
					 However, the unification of social systems which escalates mistrust and confrontation between the north and the south and brings even disasters of war is being unanimously rejected and denounced by the whole nation, to say nothing of south Koreans.
					
					 With no sophism such as "spirit of March 1 independence" and "orthodoxy" can the south Korean puppet forces justify the colonial puppet regime and conceal their ugly colors as traitors.
					
					 They had better do what they should do for the nation with the sound spirit, not staging a burlesque with strange rackets.
					
					 Minju Joson says the puppet group should stop talking about "orthodoxy", mindful that they can neither write off nor distort history.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Should Not Pull up DPRK over Its Rocket Firing for Self-Defence
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Should Not Pull up DPRK over Its Rocket Firing for Self-Defence
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The DPRK made a great success in the test-fire of latest high-performance tactical rocket of Korean style it has developed the day before the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 But a handful of south Korean puppet forces only are letting loose such a whole string of invectives that the test-fire is a "provocative demonstration of armed forces" as it lays a hurdle in the way of achieving the peace and concord of the country and casts a shadow on Seoul trip of pope. They went the lengths of blustering that the rocket test-fire is an "act contradictory" to the stand of the DPRK to take part in the Inchon Asian Games and an "attitude chilling" the atmosphere of the games.
					
					 In this regard Kim In Yong, room chief of the Rocket Research Institute of the Korean Second Natural Science Academy, made public an article titled "The south Korean puppet forces should dare not take issue any longer with our rocket firing for self-defence" on Friday.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces, obsessed with slandering the DPRK's tactical rocket firing, unhesitatingly linked it with the south Korean trip of pope.
					
					 The ultra-precision tactical rocket test-fire was conducted at the fixed date and time according to our already worked out plan to bolster up the country's capability for self-defence.
					
					 We would like to ask the pope why he set about his south Korean trip the day when we are making latest tactical rocket test-fire according to our regular plan though there are a lot of days in the year.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces' more malignant mud-slinging at the DPRK only reinforces its conviction that its cause is entirely just and we are advancing along the right path.
					
					 Upon having succeeded in the recent test-fire, the scientists in the field of national defence science and officials and technicians in the field of munitions industry of the DPRK received another exciting militant order from the Supreme Commander.
					
					 More fresh type ultra-precision latest rocket test-fire will be conducted soon in succession.
					
					 We will not care about what others may say. Various type dependable strategic and tactical rockets will soar into the sky in the future, too, to be proud of in the world.
					
					 We would like to make the south Korean puppet forces and other dishonest hostile forces blame us as they please till they become hoarse and tired.
					
					 Our test-fire of world-class cutting-edge rockets will be another powerful military demonstration, a declaration of the final ruin of the U.S. and its ally south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces should dare not take issue with the DPRK's rocket firing for self-defence any longer.

articles.title: S. Korean Religionists Call for Abrogating Agreement of Ruling and Opposition Parties
articles.content:
S. Korean Religionists Call for Abrogating Agreement of Ruling and Opposition Parties
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The Measure Committee for Ferry Sewol Disaster of the Council of Christian Churches in south Korea issued a statement on August 11 in denunciation of the sinister collusion of the puppet political camp, according to the south Korean CBS.
					 Recalling that the ruling and opposition parties abandoned to invest the fact-finding committee with the rights to investigate and indict those responsible for the disaster, the organization said it can never agree with this.
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" should not read the face of Chongwadae but show its sincere attitude for probing the truth behind the disaster, it said, and went on:
					
					 The chief executive should keep her promise with the people as regards the probe into the truth.
					
					 On the same day, the meeting of Christians remembering the ferry sinking disaster grouping Christian organizations issued a statement calling for instituting a special law desired by the bereaved families.
					
					 The statement demanded the regime discharge its obligation for probing the truth behind the disaster and take a correct measure for ensuring the people's life and security.

articles.title: S. Korean District Court Sentences Inhabitant to Prison Term
articles.content:
S. Korean District Court Sentences Inhabitant to Prison Term
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Chunchon District Court imposed penalties on an inhabitant who praised the DPRK by invoking ill-famed "Security Law", according to the south Korean CBS on August 11.
					 The court sentenced him to prison terms on the suspicion of the manufacture and distribution of copies of "literature benefiting the enemy", claiming that he posted on his website an article praising and defending the north.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Insist on Innocence of Suspects Involved in Attempted Rebellion Case
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Insist on Innocence of Suspects Involved in Attempted Rebellion Case
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The Measure Committee to Denounce the Intelligence Service's Fabrication of Plotted Rebellion and Suppression under the Pretext of Security, the Measure Committee of the Families of Victims, Missing Persons and Survivors of the Ferry Sewol Sinking Accident and the Unified the Progressive Party of south Korea held a press conference outside the Seoul High Court on August 11 and insisted on innocence of suspects involved in the case of attempted rebellion, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Minbo.
					 Speeches were made at the press conference.
					
					 Ri Chang Bok, permanent representative of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, said that at the trial on the same day the court imposed heavy penalties on those suspects involved in the case although it admitted that the underground revolutionary organization does not exist.
					
					 Lawyer Kim Chil Jun, head of the joint defence counsel of the attempted rebellion case, said that the case of the attempted rebellion is not guilty by law.
					
					 Jong Jin U, reverend of the Human Rights Center of the Council of Christian Churches, noted that the trial showed the present situation of democracy and human rights of south Korean society.
					
					 Ri Jong Hui, representative of the Unified Progressive Party, said that the regime's operation to obliterate the progressive political parties failed.
					
					 At the end of the press conference, families of those detained, members of civic and public organizations and those concerned of the Unified Progressive Party held a meeting.

articles.title: Hyundai Motors Trade Union Declares Strike
articles.content:
Hyundai Motors Trade Union Declares Strike
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- The Trade Union of Hyundai Motors of south Korea held an extraordinary meeting of deputies in Ulsan on August 12 at which it declared it would stage a strike, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 The organization said that it had conducted the wage negotiations with the regime 15 times since May, but the negotiations ended in a rupture. It will enter into a strike in protest against it, the organization declared.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Fulfill Its Legal and Moral Obligation and Responsibility for Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Fulfill Its Legal and Moral Obligation and Responsibility for Its Past Crimes
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee on Measures for the Sexual Slavery for Japanese Army and Drafting Victims in a statement on Friday accused Japan of refusing to settle the crimes it committed against Korea and its people though more than half a century has passed since its defeat. 
					 The statement noted:
					
					 The Japanese authorities have worked hard to isolate and stifle the DPRK internationally, suppressed and persecuted the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and Koreans in Japan and persistently evaded their responsibility for the crimes committed by Japan in the past, pursuant to the hostile policy toward the DPRK, the biggest victim of the Japanese imperialists, for the past 69 years.
					
					 It is the duty of Japan under international law and its state responsibility to properly redress the history of the crimes it committed after illegally occupying Korea.
					
					 People in various parts of the world are becoming increasingly vocal demanding the reaffirmation of Japan's crimes and the censure on its wrong historic viewpoint and dishonest stand to reflect on them.
					
					 This is because the Japanese authorities refuse to honestly reflect on the crimes against humanity including the sexual slavery, deny the truth about history and are keen to justify the criminal actions. 
					
					 Only when Japan fulfills its legal and moral obligation and responsibility to redress its past crimes, can it appear upright and a "normal state" before the international community.
					
					 Next year it will be seven decades since the defeat of Japanese militarism.
					
					 Before the lapse of 70 years, Japan should honestly redeem the political, moral and historical debt it has to pay to the Korean people and the Asian people and thus contribute to promoting the genuine reconciliation with the international community and establishing more stable and durable international relations in the region.

articles.title: British Organizations Support Statement of C.C., DWUK Spokeswoman
articles.content:
British Organizations Support Statement of C.C., DWUK Spokeswoman
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- British progressive organizations including the Korean Friendship Association UK released a joint statement on August 9 in support of the statement of the spokeswoman for the Central Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea (DWUK).
					 The statement said:
					
					 The sexual slavery for the U.S. forces against south Korean women is little short of the hideous sexual slavery enforced by the Imperial Japanese Army against Korean women in the past. This is an intolerable insult to the Korean women and a wanton encroachment upon the dignity of the Korean nation.
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities are conniving at the operation of many sex stations for the U.S. forces. They once claimed prostitution is an "industry without chimney" for money-making. 
					
					 This clearly reveals that the south Korean puppet forces are the group of the most mean and despicable traitors in history.
					
					 We positively support the statement issued by the spokeswoman for the Central Committee of the DWUK which calls upon south Korean women and other people of all social standings and all other Koreans to actively turn out in the struggle to drive the U.S. aggression forces, the root cause of misfortune and pain, out of south Korea as early as possible and settle accounts with the U.S. imperialists, the sworn enemy.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked by Papers of Indonesia, Kuwait
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked by Papers of Indonesia, Kuwait
Pyongyang, August 15 (KCNA) -- Indonesian and Kuwaiti papers carried articles to mark the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The Indonesian newspaper International Media on August 7 said in an article titled "Korea's liberation, historical turning point":
					
					 August 15 is the day of Korea's liberation.
					
					 The day in 1945 marked a historical turning point for the Korean people.
					
					 The liberation of the country help the Korean people get rid of the plight of the Japanese imperialists' colonial slaves and enjoy an independent and dignified life as the masters of their destiny, the state and society.
					
					 As the DPRK, the first people's democratic state in the East, was founded, Korea which once eclipsed in the world map could emerge in the international arena as an independent and sovereign state.
					
					 The DPRK turned into peculiar socialism centered on the popular masses and an invincible power unfazed by any storm.
					
					 It is taking the Juche idea and the Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and developed in depth by leader Kim Jong Il as its guidelines.
					
					 The DPRK is admired by the international community as it is adhering to its idea, social system and cause along the path chosen by itself for a long period.
					
					 The Kuwaiti newspaper Kuwait Times on August 11 carried an article praising the exploits performed by the President who rescued the density of the country and nation and built a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige lanzamiento de prueba de cohetes tacticos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige lanzamiento de prueba de cohetes tacticos
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 69o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea tuvo lugar el lanzamiento de prueba de poderosos cohetes tacticos superprecisos a estilo coreano, desarrollados bajo la iniciativa y direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					El Mariscal dirigio el lanzamiento de prueba de tales cohetes.
					
					En el puesto de observacion, el Mariscal dio la orden del lanzamiento de prueba tras estudiar los datos tecnicos de proyectiles.
					
					A traves del presente lanzamiento de prueba se ha comprobado que el manejo de cohetes tacticos en varias trayectorias balisticas alcanzo por completo a la ultramoderna demanda cientifico-tecnica militar.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que el presente lanzamiento se ha realizado con exito conforme al proposito del CC del PTC y evaluo altamente las proezas de los funcionarios, cientificos y tecnicos de la rama de la ciencia para la defensa nacional y las fabricas de materiales belicos.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que ellos presentaran las mas altas tareas de ciencia y tecnica para la defensa nacional a base de los exitos logrados ya y haran gran aporte a fortalecer cualitativamente las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la RPDC.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Ri Yong Gil, Pyon In Son, Pak Jong Chon y Hong Yong Chil.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita la Fabrica de Alimentos de Kalma
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita la Fabrica de Alimentos de Kalma
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la recien inaugurada Fabrica de Alimentos de Kalma.
					En su recorrido por varios puntos como la sala de control general, la de primera elaboracion, el almacen al vacio de refrigeracion, la sala de seleccion y embalaje, se entero en detalles del estado de produccion y administracion empresarial.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que la fabrica haya cumplido las tareas dadas por el partido, tales como impulsar bien los preparativos de inauguracion que incluyen el establecimiento del sistema de produccion integral por computadora y la modernizacion de procesos de produccion.
					
					Dijo que se llevaron a cabo en alto nivel la informatizacion y la computarizacion de las actividades empresariales, se han establecido en cadena todos los procesos de produccion desde la elaboracion de pescados hasta el transporte y el embalaje y son muy limpios los talleres de produccion.
					
					Al destacar que la fabrica debe normalizar la produccion en alto nivel y dio valiosas instrucciones para ese fin.
					
					Enseno minuciosamente las tareas y los remedios que se presentan en la gestion de la fabrica incluyendo el asunto de establecer bien el sistema de suministro de materias primas, el de garantizar la calidad y la seguridad higienica de productos, el de desarrollar un producto exclusivo que represente a esta fabrica en el sabor y la calidad y el de mejorar el embalaje.
					
					Recorriendo la sala de divulgacion de los conocimientos cientificos y tecnicos, la de reuniones y la de descaso del albergue acondicionadas en la fabrica, subrayo que los empleados pueden asimilar profundamente las tecnologias avanzadas y vivir en magnificas condiciones.
					
					La construccion de acabado de la fabrica se ha hecho tan magnifica que no se puede reconocer el aspecto de ella visto en la visita anterior, dijo y agrego en tono alegre que el interior de ella parece un palacio y el exterior se asemeja a un parque.
					
					Esta fabrica elegante da la impresion de una casa de reposo, comparo.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los empleados de la fabrica cumpliran magnificamente su deber y se fotografio con ellos.
					
					Le acompano en esta ocasion el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Han Kwang Sang.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitación del presidente palestino
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitación del presidente palestino
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Primer Presidente del Comité de Defensa Nacional de la República Popular Democrática de Corea, recibió un mensaje de felicitación que le dirigiera el día 15 el Presidente del Estado de Palestina y del Comité Ejecutivo de la Organización de Liberación Palestina, Mahmoud Abbas.
					El mensaje sigue:
					
					Reciba el testimonio de mi alta consideración.
					
					Con el placer de celebrar junto con ustedes el día de liberación de la patria, lograda a cambio del más noble sacrificio de su pueblo, deseo con ese motivo en nombre del Estado y el pueblo de Palestina y en el mío propio el progreso y la prosperidad deseados por su país y pueblo.
					
					Apreciamos mucho las relaciones Corea-Palestina que tienen una historia de decenas de años.
					
					La República Popular Democrática de Corea es la amiga verdadera que brindó toda la ayuda posible a nuestra lucha por poner punto final a la ocupación de Israel.
					
					Estoy convencido de que su país mantendrá invariablemente la posición de principios para cesar el continuo ataque militar de Israel contra nuestro pueblo, crimen de guerra que debe ser pasado de cuentas y condenado en escala internacional.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a presidente congoleno
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a presidente congoleno
Pyongyang, 15 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 15 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica del Congo, Denis Sassou-Nguesso en ocasion del 54o aniversario de la independencia de este pais africano.
					El remitente expresa la conviccion de que las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre los dos paises se ampliaran y se desarrollaran mas y desea al destinatario y a su pueblo mayores exitos en las labores para el desarrollo del pais y la prosperidad de la nacion.
